Producer: Peter Danner, Renan Artukmac, Alex Zito, Juan Pablo García, Ignacio Rey, Gastón Rothschild, Juan de Dios Larraín
Production Co: Participant Media, Setembro Cine, Fabula, Funny Balloons, AZ Films, Reborn Production
Synopsis: A determined police inspector (Gael García Bernal) searches for Chilean politician Pablo Neruda (Luis Gnecco) after he goes into hiding in 1948.
Title: Neruda
